name: Climb - Student Project
description:
Climb is a endless vertical platformer.

Do your best to avoid the rising lava as you travel upwards using double jumping and wall jumping through the infinite generating tower.

-CONTROLS-

A for left movement

D for right movement

Space for jumping

Double jump - Space while in air

Wall jump - Space while moving into (using A or D) a wall

-BACKGROUND-

Created for my programming fundamentals assessment at AIE. It was the first project I've ever made using unity along with my first attempt programming something.

Made within the 6 week window for the module, I'm happy with what I made and learnt a lot from this assessment. Thought I would upload it to always be able to look back at my first game created and see how far I've come since then.

-IMPORTANT-

The main menu EXIT and OPTIONS menus don't function so you will need to ALT-F4 or task manager to close this application. Options has a volume sliding but it does not function.
